title: Pack Light & Smart
description: Minimize your carbon footprint by packing only essentials. Choose lightweight items.

title: Eco-Friendly Transit
description: Choose trains, buses, or electric vehicles over flying whenever possible to reduce emissions.

title: Stay in Green Hotels
description: Opt for eco-friendly accommodations with certifications like solar-powered energy systems.

title: Bring Reusable Gear
description: Pack reusable water bottles, utensils, and bags to reduce waste and avoid single-use plastics.
